DOC.brief_summary: The purpose school-based trial test efficacy intervention increase moderate vigorous physical activity ( MVPA ) among middle school girl . The 17-week `` Girls Move '' ( GOTM ) intervention 3 component . Two individual-level component occur school hour include : ( 1 ) two face-to-face motivational , individually tailor counseling session school nurse , ( 2 ) interactive Internet-based session girl receive motivational , individually tailor feedback message ( 9 week ) . A group-level component , 90-minute Physical Activity ( PA ) Club provide important venue school include activity assist girl establish behavioral pattern MVPA . The control condition complete data collection activity receive usual school offering . The investigator hypothesize immediately post-intervention , minute MVPA great 16 min./wk . intervention control group ; At 9 month post-intervention follow-up , minute MVPA great intervention control group ; immediately post-intervention 9-mo . post-intervention follow-up , cardiovascular ( CV ) fitness high body mass index ( BMI ) percent body fat low intervention control group .
DOC.brief_title: Girls Move Intervention Increase Physical Activity Among Middle School Girls
DOC.detailed_description: Our 17-week `` Girls Move '' ( GOTM ) intervention middle school girl apply Health Promotion Model ( HPM ) Self-Determination Theory ( SDT ) 3 component . Two individual-level component occur school hour include : ( 1 ) two face-to-face motivational , individually tailor counseling session school nurse ( occur baseline near 17 wks . ) , ( 2 ) interactive Internet-based session girl receive motivational , individually tailor feedback message ( 9 wks. ) . A group-level component , 90-min . PA Club , lead PA instructor ( e.g. , individual community ; teacher , include physical education ( PE ) ; sport team coach ) provide important venue school include MVPAs ( request girl pilot ) assist girl establish behavioral pattern MVPA . The control condition complete data collection activity receive usual school offering . The purpose school-based group randomize trial ( GRT ) evaluate efficacy comprehensive GOTM intervention increase middle school girl ' min . MVPA improve cardiovascular ( CV ) fitness , body mass index ( BMI ) , percent body fat ( % BF ) immediately post-intervention ( 17 wks . ) 9-mo . follow-up ( F/U ; 9 mo . end intervention ) . Secondary analysis examine MVPA mediate cognitive ( e.g. , perceive benefit PA , barrier PA , PA self-efficacy ; social support ) affective variable ( e.g. , enjoyment motivation PA ) . Based demographic urban school , expect low-SES , mixed-race , predominately African American , sample . Eight school randomly assign PA intervention ( n = 4 ) comparison condition ( n = 4 ) fall yr . 2 , 3 , 4 ( total N = 8 X 3 = 24 different school ) . Sixty-two girl meet inclusion criterion base answer screen tool recruit school three yr . The long-term goal increase MVPA mean address high overweight obesity prevalence among adolescent girl .
DOC.criteria: 5th 6th 7thgrade girl ( age 914 ; 8thgraders need middle school 7th 8th grade ) Available willing participate PA Club 3 days/wk . 17wks . Available followup ( 9 mo . intervention end ) Agree random assignment Able read , understand , speak English . Involved plan involved school community sport organize PAs , dance lesson , involve MVPA require participation 3 days/wk . school every season school year A health condition preclude safe MVPA .
